pages.page: THE ATHLETE’S HEADPHONE Our patented Sound Channel Design comfortably seal in heart-pounding music but keeps you safe by allowing some noise in, like tra c noise for runners or bikers. The tangle- free cord is a perfect t for goggles, glasses, and helmets, means you can don these in-ear headphones for any sport. The is pure audio adrenaline. • Pure Monster Sound® • Bluetooth® Wireless • Patented SportClipTM stays in your ear • Volume Up/Down and Play/Pause Controls 6+ HRS 6+ Hour Dual Battery Also Included: x3 x1 Pure Monster Monster SecureFitTM SoundTM SportclipTM #MAKEITHAPPEN Durable and Sweat-proof SportClipTM Pouch Follow us @MonsterProducts FOLLOW US @MONSTERPRODUCTS INTENSITY WIRELESS Available Colors
